EmailTemplate.name: Tax Exemption Expiration 30 Day Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: TAX EXEMPTION EXPIRATION 30 DAY NOTIFICATION - {!Account.Cust_ID__c} - {!Account_Profile__c.Address_State__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.OwnerFullName},
This is a 2nd notice to advise you that your customer, {!Account.Name}, Account # {!Account.Cust_ID__c} for the state of {!Account_Profile__c.Address_State__c} is currently tax exempt. On {!Account_Profile__c.Expiration_Date__c}, this certificate will expire.
Therefore, it is urgent that you obtain a new tax exemption certificate from your customer and provide it to the Tax Department prior to the expiration of the certificate. Fax or email the certificate to the tax department: BSD-TaxExemption@officedepot.com
Fax # 561-438-2406
Questions? Call 800-848-8100
Thank you for your assistance in this matter.
Sincerely,
Office Depot Tax Department
